content.raw:
I think there is a simpler change that won't require changing dependencies and CI scripts:

~~~
diff -r 90f685aa340f src/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/src/CMakeLists.txt	Mon Apr 08 17:20:24 2019 +0000
+++ b/src/CMakeLists.txt	Wed Jul 10 21:42:59 2019 +0000
@@ -8,7 +8,7 @@
 # Link the libraries that we always need.
 target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_LIBRARY_TARGET_NAME}
   PUBLIC
-    ignition-cmake${IGN_CMAKE_VER}::utilities
+    ignition-cmake${IGNITION_CMAKE_VERSION_MAJOR}::utilities
     ignition-msgs${IGN_MSGS_VER}::ignition-msgs${IGN_MSGS_VER}
   PRIVATE
     ${ZeroMQ_TARGET}
~~~
